doc.title: Country Dancing for Beginners
doc.plot: Includes the basics for new dancers that who to fit in right away. Teresa Mason teaches the Two-Step, Waltz, East Coast Swing, Cha-Cha, Polka and West Coast Swing. All of the steps are demonstrated: man's footwork first, then with a partner, then with music. Finally, all of the basic steps are put together in an easy-to-follow routine.
